test-case.name: fn-items-at-036
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `count(items-at((1, 2, 3, "four"), 3)) eq 1`.

test-case.name: fn-items-at-037
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `count(items-at((1, 2, 3, "four"), 4, 1)) eq 1`.
